One of these lists is about the richest women to have walked the earth. In the bipolar world that we live in, it is not uncanny to find women working and earning on the same level as men. Following the death of former richest woman Liliane Bettencourt, the daughter of the founder of L‚ÄôOreal Eugene Schuelle, questions were raised on who would be declared now as the richest of them all. So no wonder everyone‚Äôs curious to know the name of the woman who would take Liliane Bettencourt‚Äôs place. Well, the wait is over as the new list is up! We have the richest woman on the planet, and we are about to disclose her name. But not just that, we bring you, next 14 runner-ups, as well. So let‚Äôs have a look at the profiles of the top 15 richest women in the world alive.</p> <h2>Margaretta Taylor</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/10/c-users-khurram-mehboob-downloads-2-10-2235-1-jpg.jpeg"/>Tumblr <p>Margaretta Taylor, the sharer of Cox Enterprises, has bread run in her family. She along with her two siblings got equal percentage share from her mother‚Äôs inheritance, i.e., 17% of the 49.9% share Anne Cox Chambers had from her father‚Äôs company. So basically today, Margaretta Taylor has an earnings of $8.5 billion with her son being the Chief Operating Officer at Cox Enterprises. Although an heiress of her massive media empire, Margaretta Taylor donates a lot to wildlife and humanity.</p> <h2>Katharine Rayner</h2>  <p></p>  <p>Posted by Katharine Rayner on¬†Friday, December 16, 2016</p>  <p>Margaretta Taylor‚Äôs Sister Katharine Rayner enjoys her 17% share in much the same way. Being an inheritor of the Cox Enterprises, Katharine Rayner lives a lavish life. The Cox Enterprises owns media publications and brands that provide Katharine enough money to feed generations. As one of the owners of the company, Katharine is quite relaxed and content with earning money without any work. She enjoys her leisure time and like her sister makes donations to help humanity and wildlife.</p> <h2>Zhou Qunfei</h2>      <p> ‚Äì Zhou Qunfel #stocks #forex #wallstreet #nyse #nasdaq #money #business #tsx #markets #stockmarket #entrepreneur #dowjones #finance #economy #stockexchange #daytrader #investor #stocktrader #trader #education #motivation #inspiration #learn #billions #wealth #investmentbanking #millions #zhouqunfei #lenstechnology #hongkong</p> <p>A post shared by ü¶àüìà (@stocksharks) on Mar 27, 2017 at 1:13pm PDT</p>   <p></p> <p>Zhou Qunfei is known as the world‚Äôs richest self-made woman originating from China. A school drop-out, she is the only billionaire woman to grow herself into what she is today. Zhou Qunfei is the founder of Lens Technology, a screen producing company for smartphones. She started building herself up at the age of 22 by selling watch lenses and today has companies standing in line for her to provide screens for their phones. Starting off as a watch repairer back in the 90s, Zhou Qunfei is now the receiver of $11.4 billion every month. Even though Motorola isn‚Äôt out there anymore, it made Zhou Qunfei what she is today and who knows she‚Äôs thankful to Motorola for that. After that, Zhou started creating phone screens for other companies like Samsung, Nokia, and HTC. Her company is a now a regular screen creator for Apple iPhones.</p> <h2>Blair Parry-Okeden</h2>  <p>Blair Parry-Okeden: Australian billionaire you‚Äôve never heard of https://t.co/Zzgve8WDbY pic.twitter.com/NSjVSVSXXc</p> <p>‚Äî redball (@redball2) April 25, 2017</p> <p></p> <p>An American living in Australia, Blair Parry-Okeden replaced Gina Rinehart in 2016 as the richest woman in Australia that landed her in 11th position worldwide. She got a 25% share from her grandfather‚Äôs company and a life in utmost luxury.</p> <h2>Abigail Johnson</h2> <img src="https://cdnone.netlify.com/db/2017/10/c-users-khurram-mehboob-downloads-2-10-2235-5-jpg.jpeg"/>Wikimedia <p>Family wealth worked out pretty well for Abigail Johnson too as she is today the CEO, the president, and the chairman of Fidelity Investments, a firm started by her grandfather. Abigail Johnson is the only woman to represent Fidelity Investments on board of Financial Services Forum.</p> <h2>Gina Rinehart</h2>  <p>via @BellaFlokarti #GinaRinehart Quote#Auspol #LNP #SpringSt #NSWpol#QLDpol #NTpol #WApol #saparli #politas #Abbott @banas51 #LNPMemes pic.twitter.com/SAVpVUqnKb</p>     <p>‚Äî TALAOLP (@Talaolp) September 16, 2017</p> <p></p> <p>Though she had lost her position as the richest woman in Australia in 2016 as mentioned above, Gina Rinehart stands 9th today worldwide. This mining lady took the company towards great success and can be called as the iron ore heiress.</p> <h2>Charlene de Carvalho-Heineken</h2>  <p>Charlene de Carvalho ‚Äì Heineken koopt voor 200 mln euro aandelen bij, en vergroot zo de ademruimte van de brouwer. https://t.co/kW6A3cpY9L pic.twitter.com/0if2j82E75</p> <p>‚Äî Mathijs Smit (@Mathijs__Smit) September 21, 2017</p> <p></p> <p>Following the family business, Charlene de Carvalho-Heineken is the world‚Äôs 8th richest woman who is the executive director of the world‚Äôs second-largest beer producing company. She spends an enormous amount of her money on donations and lives a peaceful life with her sons, much like how her husband‚Äôs last days were.</p> <h2>Yang Huiyan</h2>  <p>Yang Huiyan N·ªØ t·ª∑ ph√∫ gi√†u nh·∫•t ch√¢u √Å n√†y hi·ªán m·ªõi ch·ªâ 36 tu·ªïi. pic.twitter.com/OVmlsLsXBo</p> <p>‚Äî Tokyo Nhat (@NhatTokyo) July 27, 2017</p> <p></p> <p>So far all the rich woman we‚Äôve mentioned took years to build themselves up whether by inheriting the family business or by struggling on their own. Yang Huiyan currently serves as the chairperson of the board‚Äôs governance committee.</p> <h2>Laurene Powell Jobs</h2>  <p>Laurene Powell Jobs is using Ronald Reagan in political ads to attack Trump‚Äôs DACA decision https://t.co/i5bGWfZwR4 pic.twitter.com/qy2FsPGwp6</p> <p>‚Äî Paul Lopez (@lopezunwired) September 18, 2017</p> <p></p> <p>Well everybody loves Apple, and so everybody has loved Steve Jobs. Despite being rich from the start, Laurene Powell Jobs was added to the list after she inherited the Steven P. Jobs Trust when her husband passed away. She is the 5th richest woman in the world, following her husband as among the top richest men worldwide.</p> <h2>Susanne Klatten</h2>  <p>Wealth of Susanne Klatten, richest person in Germany, is at a 5-year high of $22.2 billionhttps://t.co/xY4aDem3SO pic.twitter.com/qk1XBPTidZ</p> <p>‚Äî BBG Billionaires (@BBGBillionaires) September 15, 2017</p> <p></p> <p>The shareholder of BMW, Susanne Klatten is the richest woman in Germany, the 38th richest person in the world, and the 4th richest woman on the planet. But ever since she made BMW rise to fame again, she has never looked back!</p> <h2>Jacqueline Mars</h2>  <p>America's richest women 2016:</p> <p>-Alice Walton $35.4B-Jacqueline Mars $27B-Laurene Powell Jobs $17.7Bhttps://t.co/pUYbEq7bbH #Forbes400 pic.twitter.com/uhcbYi8zn8</p> <p>‚Äî Forbes (@Forbes) October 7, 2016</p> <p></p> <p>Chocolates? Chocolates. Who knew they could make you so rich? We all grew up eating the scrumptious Mars bars, Snickers, Twix, Maltesers, Galaxy, and M&Ms. Did you know the same company owned they all? This chocolate lady is an American heiress and the 3rd richest woman around the globe who‚Äôs been making everyone happy by giving them chocolates because yes, chocolates make you happy!</p> <h2>Maria Franca Fissolo</h2>  <p>Maria Franca Fissolo, la millonaria del chocolate https://t.co/lqmORe2Cx5 pic.twitter.com/SCaojapjXi</p> <p>‚Äî Ruwayda (@_Ruwayda_) July 30, 2017</p> <p></p> <p>Ferrero Rocher everybody, Ferrero Rocher. She is the only inheritor of the world‚Äôs second-largest confectionery company, running it along with her elder son who has had served as the company‚Äôs co-CEO. This Italian woman is the 2nd richest in our list.</p> <h2>Alice Walton</h2>  <p>The 2nd richest female in the world is Alice Walton, who is worth $33.8 billion, $1.5 billion more than last year #Walmart daughter #texas pic.twitter.com/i3P71c3YPe</p> <p>‚Äî Sungold Properties (@SungoldProperty) September 25, 2017</p> <p></p>     <p>Now the woman you‚Äôve wanted to know about for so long and for whom you had to go through this long list is Alice Walton. Yes, the owner of Walt Inc. And do you know what her net worth is? Of course, you don‚Äôt. It is $32 billion, and that makes her the richest woman to walk the earth so far. Well, I guess we really can‚Äôt say anything. Only the rich people know what it‚Äôs like to be RICH!</p> <p>¬†</p> <p>¬†</p>   <i></i>
